definitions.definition: A spicy salami -style Italian-American sausage made from cured pork and beef seasoned with pepper .
Pizza with only tomato sauce, cheese and pepperoni toppings.
examples: Yo, Tony, gimme a slice of pepperoni and a coke.

main_definition: A spicy salami -style Italian-American sausage made from cured pork and beef seasoned with pepper .
secondary_definitions: Pizza with only tomato sauce, cheese and pepperoni toppings.
